（シミュレーターでの訓練とはいえ……）: (It may be training in the simulator, but...)
だ、だだだだだ！ 大丈夫！\nま、前は戦えたんだから、このくらい……！:
Wh-Wh-What?! I'm fine!
I-I was able to fight before, so this is nothing...!
そうはいうけど、無理はしないで。: You say that, but don't push yourself too hard.
う、うん！ ……よし、相手はただの……た、ただの……\nや、やや、やっぱり……:
Y-Yeah! ...Okay, we're up against just...a-a simple...
I-I-I knew it...
（……ラウラが戦えるようになるための特訓だったが……\nすぐには上手くいかないか:
(...It was special training so that Laura could fight, but...)
It won't work right away.)
仕方ないさ。今日のシミュレーター訓練は中止だ。\nというわけで、解散！:
It can't be helped. Today's simulator training is canceled.
And so, disband!
分かったわ！\nあ、ラウラ！ あんまり気にしちゃダメよ！:
All right, all right!
Oh, Laura! Don't worry about it too much!
シミュレーター訓練で実践じゃないから、\nまだ失敗しても大丈夫よ。:
It's not practice in simulator training,
You can still fail.
うんうん！ それに、いつも私たちって、\nラウラに助けられてるからね！:
Yeah, yeah! Besides, we're always...
Laura's helping me out!
はぁ……\nでも、このままじゃだめだよね……:
Hah...
But we can't keep going like this...
（いつものんびりしてて明るいラウラだけど、\nさすがに落ち込んでるみたいだな……:
(Laura is always so carefree and cheerful, but...)
She really does seem depressed...)
……反省会をしようとは言ったが、\n流石にふたりきりだと話しづらいか？:
...I said I was going to have a review session, but...
Is it hard to talk when it's just the two of us?
……ううん、大丈夫。\nどっちかっていうと、自分がダメダメで落ち込んでいるの。:
...No, I'm fine.
If anything, I'm depressed because I can't handle myself.
メイズシフターを前にすると、どうしても怖くて……: When faced with a maise shifter, I couldn't help but be scared...
でも、前にシリウスシュガーと一緒に戦った時は、\nラウラも動けてたよな？:
But the last time I fought alongside Sirius Sugaru...
Laura was able to move too, right?
うん……その、ラミちゃんと一緒に戦った時には、\n安心してたのと頑張ろうって気持:
Yeah... Um, when I fought alongside Rami-chan...
I was able to fight with a feeling of relief and a desire to do my best, but...
でも、シミュレーターでも怖くて……\nうう、メイズシフターと戦うのも仕事なのに…:
But even in the simulator, I was scared...
Ugh, it's my job to fight the Maizsifter, too...
まあ、メイズシフターが苦手な生徒もいるが……\n怯えて戦えないレベルなのは珍しい:
Well, there are some students who don't like maise shifters, but...
It's rare for her to be at a level where she can't fight in fear.
いや、別に責めてるわけじゃない。\nそれに、今日は少しでも動くことができたじゃな:
No, I wasn't blaming her or anything.
Besides, I was able to move even a little today.
そうなんだけど……みんなが頑張って成長してるのに、\n私だけが足を引っ張ってるか:
That's true, but... everyone's doing their best to grow,
I'm the only one holding you back...
皆のために、私も力になりたいの。\n皆から守られてるだけじゃ……お姉さん失格だも:
I want to help everyone.
Just being protected by everyone is enough to disqualify me as a big sister.
でも、結果が出てないと意味がないわ……: But there's no point if we don't get results...
そうだな……まず、メイズシフターの何が無理なんだ？\nそれが分析できれば、少しは:
Let's see... First of all, what's impossible about the Mazesifter?
If we can analyze that, we should be able to do something about it.
メイズシフターのダメなところ……\nその、私は虫やお化けが苦手なの！:
What's so bad about the maise shifter...
Um, I'm not good with bugs or ghosts!
本当に、虫は触れないしお化けなんて見るだけでダメで……\nだから、お化けみたいな:
I really can't just look at a monster that doesn't touch bugs...
That's why I'm really scared of the ghost-like Mayse-Sifter...
お化けみたい……か？\nまあ、ユニークな見た目はしてるが……:
Like a ghost...?
Well, it has a unique appearance, but...
だ、だってありえない見た目をしてるし……！\nそれに、なんだか怖い目をしてるし…:
I-I mean, it looks like it's impossible...!
And she's got scary eyes, too...!
（まあ、お化けも面白い見た目をしてるやつがいるし、\n人には人の事情があるもんな:
(Well, some ghosts have interesting looks, too
People have their own circumstances, after all.)
なあラウラ。どうしても無理だっていうなら、\nメイズシフターと戦わない方法も考え:
Hey, Laura. If you really think it's impossible...
Why don't we think of a way not to fight the maise shifter?
ありがとう、%usernameusernameuserna%さん。\nでも……皆:
Thank you, %usernameusernameuserna%.
But... I want to fight with everyone.
私だけ、皆よりもできないのに守ってもらうなんて……\nそんなお荷物になっちゃうの:
I'm the only one who can't do it more than everyone else, but you're protecting me...
I don't want to be a burden like that.
ジュリーちゃんたちと一緒に頑張るためにも……\nメイズシフターへの恐怖を乗り越え:
In order to do my best with Julie and the others...
I want to overcome my fear of the maise shifter!
……そうか。そこまで熱い思いがあるなら、俺も全力で手伝おう。\n挑戦……そうだ、:
...I see. If you're that passionate about it, then I'll do my best to help.
A challenge... That's right, I've got an idea!
ラウラはメイズシフターへの恐怖を克服したいんだろ？: Laura wants to overcome her fear of the maise shifter, right?
うん……克服したい！\nこのままの私じゃいけないって思ってるから。:
Yeah... I want to overcome it!
I don't think I can stay the way I am.
だったら……いきなりメイズシフターと戦いに行くんじゃなくて、\nまずは大丈夫なラ:
In that case... I'm not going to go fight the Maizsifter right off the bat
I don't think it's a good idea to start by gradually getting used to the fine lines.
だから、ほら……まずはこんなのから挑戦するのはどうだろう？: So, come on... How about we start with something like this?
ああ、テントウムシ。\n丸っこくて比較的見た目も可愛いし、触ってみないか？:
Ah, ladybug.
It's round and relatively cute, so why don't you try touching it?
わ、こ、こっちに近付けないで……\nひ、ひ、ひ、ひゃああああ～！！:
Wah, d-don't come near me...
H-H-Hyaaaaah!!
テントウムシでもそこまでダメなのか……: So even a ladybug can't do that...
ご、ごめんなさい……テントウムシは見るならいいけど、\nそこまで近くに来ると怖く:
I-I'm sorry... It's fine if you're looking at the ladybugs, but...
When I get that close, I'm scared...
……このレベルでダメなら、\nちょっとやそっとの対策じゃ恐怖心の克服は難しいかも:
...If I can't do it at this level,
It might be difficult to overcome your fear with a little bit of a gentle countermeasure.
そ、そんなことないわ！\nわ、私……頑張るから！:
Th-That's not true!
I-I'll... do my best!
いや、努力でもどうしようもないことはあるんだ。\nラウラ、頑張ることに拘っちゃい:
No, there are things that can't be done by hard work.
Laura, you mustn't worry about doing your best.
大切なのは、ラウラが皆の役に立てることだろう？\n恐怖心を克服するのが本題じゃな:
What's important is that Laura can be of use to everyone, right?
Overcoming my fear isn't the main issue.
だから、自分に合った戦い方を見つけて、\n皆のために役に立つことなんじゃないか？:
That's why she'd found a way to fight that suited her
Isn't it useful for everyone?
自分に合った戦い方……: A way of fighting that suits you...
……うん！ ありがとう、%usernameusernameuserna%さん！\:
...Yeah! Thanks, %usernameusernameuserna%!
I'll think about it a little more!
（ラウラは難しい顔をして考えてるが……\nそう簡単に自分に合った戦い方の答えは見:
(Laura is thinking with a difficult face, but...)
You can't find an answer to a battle that suits you that easily.)
ほら、ラウラ。根を詰めすぎだ。\nこのスイーツでも食べて気分転換をしないか？:
Come on, Laura. You're pushing yourself too hard.
Why don't we have some of these sweets for a change of pace?
うん、とっても美味しい！\n色々と考えて頭を悩ませてたから、染み渡るなぁ……:
Yeah, it's really good!
I've been thinking about a lot of things and racking my brain, so it's seeping into me...
（よかった、多少は気分転換になったみたいだな）: (Thank goodness. Looks like it was a change of pace.)
こんなに美味しいと、\n実家の弟や妹たちにも食べさせてあげたくなっちゃうな。:
When it's this good,
It makes me want to feed my younger brothers and sisters back home, too.
弟や妹？ ラウラの家は兄弟が多いのか？: Little brothers and sisters? Do Laura's family have a lot of brothers?
うん、実家は家族がいっぱいいるから、\n私だけでも早く立派になって、両親を安心さ:
Yeah, my family has a lot of families back home,
I want to become admirable on my own and reassure my parents.
そうかな？ 家族仲もいいし……\nこのくらいは普通だと思うけど……:
You think so? They're really close...
I think this much is normal, but...
でも、褒めてくれてありがとうね♪: But thank you for the compliment♪
普段から面倒見がいいし、弟や妹ってことは、\n実家だとラウラが一番のお姉さんなの:
She's usually good at taking care of people, and being a little brother or sister means...
Is Laura the oldest sister back home?
うん、一番年上だよ。\nうちの子は小さいから、あそこにいる子くらいの弟が……:
Yeah, she's the oldest.
My child is small, so I have a little brother who's about the size of the one over there...
うおっ！？\n急に飛び出してどうした！？:
Whoa!?
Why are you jumping out all of a sudden?!
（……っ、ラウラの向かった先に、\n子どもが……車に轢かれそうになってる！？）:
(...! Where Laura was headed...)
A child... is about to be run over by a car!?)
はぁっ、はぁっ、はぁ……\nよかった、間一髪だったね……:
*pant pant*...
Thank goodness, it was just in time...
もう大丈夫だから、安心して……ほら、泣かないで～。\nうん、うん、いい子ね～。:
Don't worry, I'm fine now... Come on, don't cry.
Yeah, yeah, she's a good girl.
これからは、車には気をつけてね！\nもう飛び出したりしちゃ駄目だからね。:
Watch out for cars from now on!
Don't jump out again.
うん……きをつける。\nばいばい、お姉ちゃん！:
Yeah... I'll give it a try.
Bye bye, Onee-chan!
ばいば～い！\n……ふぅ、良かったぁ……あの子が怪我をしなくて。:
Bye bye!
Phew... I'm so glad she didn't get hurt.
（……しかし、あの時の動き……\n今までと違うくらいに機敏な動きだったな）:
(...But the way he moved back then...)
Her movements were more nimble than ever before.)
（そういえば、あの時はラミと組んでいたよな……？\nそうなると……もしや？）:
(Come to think of it, you were working with Rami back then, right...?)
In that case... could it be?)
ラウラ、明日皆を集めてシミュレータールームで訓練をしよう。: Laura, let's gather everyone and train in the simulator room tomorrow.
えっ！？ で、でも、まだ解決方法が見つかってなくて……: Huh?! B-But we still haven't figured out a way to solve it...
いや、ラウラに向いている方法があったかもしれないんだ。: No, there might have been a way for Laura to do it.
危ないっ！\nここは……ううっ、私が壁になるわ！:
Watch out!
This is... Ugh, I'll be the wall!
ありがとうラウラ！ よーし、行くわよノエル！: Thanks, Laura! Alright, let's go, Noel!
おっけー！\nそれじゃあ、一気にヤっちゃおう！:
Okay!
Well then, let's do it all at once!
（今までの訓練だったら、ラウラは役に立つために一番に、\n前線に出て敵を倒そうと:
(If it had been training up until now, Laura would have been the best to be useful
He was going out to the front lines to defeat the enemy...)
（だけども、後ろで周囲を見て、誰かを守るための動き……\nチームを守る盾としての:
(But still, she's watching her surroundings from behind, moving to protect someone...)
As long as you're acting as a shield to protect the team, you can fulfill your role.)
シミュレーター訓練は終了……無事に撃破か。\nお疲れ様だ！:
The simulator training is over... I guess we'll be able to defeat them without incident.
Good work!
ああ、ちゃんと見てたぞ！\n立派にチームに貢献できてたな！:
Yeah, I was watching!
You did a great job on the team!
良かった……！\nこんな風な形で、皆の助けになれるなんて……！:
Thank goodness...!
I never thought I'd be able to help everyone like this...!
これも、%usernameusernameuserna%さんのおかげ……！\n本:
This is all thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%...!
Thank you so much!
いや、俺がやったことなんて大したことじゃない。\nラウラの本来の才能だからだ。:
No, what I did was no big deal.
It was because it was Laura's natural talent.
それに、優しいラウラが敵を倒そうっていうのが、\nそれだけで苦手意識が強くなるだ:
Besides, the fact that the kind Laura was trying to defeat the enemy was...
I'm sure that's enough to make her feel uncomfortable.
……うん、もしかしたらそうなのかも。\nメイズシフターでも、自分の手で倒すって考:
...Yeah, maybe that's true.
Even if it's a maise shifter, when you think about defeating it with your own hands...
でも、こんなことを悩んでてもいいのかな？\nメイズシフターは襲ってくるんだし……:
But is it okay for me to be worrying about this?
The maise shifters are going to attack us...
今は考えなくてもいいさ。\n最初の一歩を踏み出せたんだ。それが重要だ。:
You don't have to think about it right now.
I was able to take the first step. That's what matters.
……うん、そうだよね。私、怖いと思ってても、\nちゃんと皆を守ることができたよね:
...Yeah, that's right. Even if I think I'm scared,
You were able to protect everyone!
ああ、そうだ。\nラウラが皆の事を助けたんだ。それは誇ってもいいぞ。:
Yeah, that's right.
Laura saved everyone. You can be proud of that.
……えへへ。本当にうれしくて……涙が出ちゃいそう。: ......ehehe. I'm so happy......I'm about to cry.
このままがんばっていけば、\nみんなと一緒に正式なチームとして昇格できるかも！:
If I keep doing my best,
I might even be promoted to an official team with everyone!
ああ、きっとできるはずだ。\nそれだけ悩んで頑張ってきたからな。:
Yeah, I'm sure I can do it.
That's just how much I've been worrying and working hard.
そうだよね……！\nこれが私の戦い方なんだって、胸を張って頑張るね！:
You're right...!
This is how I fight. I'll do my best to be proud!
ふふ、何でもできる気がしてきたわ！\n今の私なら、虫だって触って克服できちゃうか:
Hehe, I'm starting to feel like I can do anything!
As I am now, I might even be able to overcome bugs by touching them...!
それなら、その手に止まってる虫を、\nそっと逃がしてやってあげたらどうだ？:
In that case, I'll take the bug that's perched in her hand...
Why don't you let him get away?
さっき話している最中に飛んできたんだ。\nまあ、気づいてなかったから言わなかった:
I flew here while we were talking.
Well, I hadn't noticed, so I didn't tell you...
お、おいラウラ！？ 大丈夫か！？\n……き、気絶してる。:
H-Hey, Laura?! Are you okay?!
...I-I'm unconscious.
……はぁ、まあ、ゆっくり成長していかないとダメだな、これは……: ...Hah, well, I have to grow slowly, this is...
